title: Tamarind seed polysaccharides, proteins, and mucilage: extraction, modification of properties, and their application in food
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00224E, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
M. Geethalaxmi, C. K. Sunil, N. Venkatachalapathy
Tamarind seeds, a by-product of the tamarind processing industry, are an excellent source of vital fats and amino acids and they also contain a good amount of carbohydrates and proteins.
